question: It is difficult for people living in cities today get enough physical exercise. Why is this the case? What can be done to solve the problem
text: Currently , everyone wants to live in the urban area but it is difficult to stay there , due to physical problems , which happened because of them , this essay illustrates the reasons and solutions to the above statement.

First of all , they have a busy schedule and cannot take out time for their own life , in addition , they work the whole day that is the reason they spend less time , for example , nowadays , a number of people work 12 hours a day , consequently , they cannot spare time for it.

Moreover , owing to advanced technology , people become lazier and they use it every work , even though they know , it is harmful to us  , for instance , numerous people use transportation , however , they have to get closer , therefore they become naturally weak.

On the other hand , they should spare time for themselves and join some exercise clube , it helps them to develop physical strength , such as a plethora of the public joined yoga classes , due to the requirement of it so they feel good mentally as well as physical. Secondly , it should be kept running as possible, in light of the fact that it helps us to prepare our body to illness free , for instance , behind ,it a scientific reason is there whenever we are running , the bacteria are eliminated through sweat , as a result , it cleans our body without any treatment.
In conclusion , everyone should do exercise, which helps our body as well as mental diseases. If we want to live in the city , must do it and get  prestigious health.
